about_the_game:
Room Invaderz is a wave-based survival game where you are constantly being surrounded by the undead! Kill zombies and do challenges to earn points to help you purchase the many items you'll need to give yourself a fighting chance.

Try your best to survive as long as you can, although you'll only be delaying the inevitable!

DEMO:

The demo is a work in progress and will be used as a sort of free early access for the first map of the game. I will continuously be updating the demo throughout the development of the game to keep it as up to date as possible with bug fixes, new features such as elixirs, easter eggs, weapon upgrading, as well as overall polish. I hope you enjoy the demo and thank you for giving it a chance!

  • The Demo is single player only at the moment.

  • Only keyboard and mouse is officially supported at this time, but controllers do work for most things.

  • Tip: For the most amount of points, try dismembering as many zombie limbs as you can before dealing the killing blow! Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: Room Invaderz contains violence, blood, minor gore, and has horror themes that may not be suitable for all ages.

name: Room Invaderz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10500 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Survive the living dead for as long as you are able! Room Invaderz is a wave-based survival game where you and your comrades kill zombies, earn points, and do your best to upgrade your arsenal to see how long you can delay the inevitable.
